function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 Outbreak on Indian Construction Industry","Impact":"Disruption of construction activities, health risks to workers, and economic downturn","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, using digital collaboration tools, and diversifying supply chains","Technologies":"Digital collaboration platforms, health monitoring tools, and supply chain management software","People":"Construction workers, project managers, and stakeholders in the construction industry","Owner":"Government, construction companies, and industry associations"},{"Description":"Lack of Systematic Approach for Value Engineering","Impact":"Suboptimal cost-saving opportunities, inefficient resource allocation, and decreased project value","Mitigation":"Implementing specialized training programs, integrating value engineering into project management processes, and conducting regular value engineering audits","Technologies":"Project management software, value engineering tools, and data analytics platforms","People":"Project managers, value engineers, and construction project teams","Owner":"Construction companies, project management teams, and industry associations"},{"Description":"Inadequate Adoption of Risk Assessment in Project Management","Impact":"Undetected project risks, increased likelihood of project failures, and potential safety hazards for construction workers","Mitigation":"Training project teams in risk assessment, integrating risk assessment tools into project planning, and establishing a risk management culture","Technologies":"Risk assessment software, predictive analytics tools, and real-time monitoring systems","People":"Project managers, risk management teams, and construction workers","Owner":"Project management teams, construction companies, and industry associations"}]}
